column4: hi all. I need some help with my firewall.... dunno how to configure it decently...
any1 know anything about firewalls? I need some help....!
madcowboy: dunno how to configure my firewall properly... im running p2p, but i always seem to totally block everything instead of letting p2p apps go thru...
madcowboy: yup, with nat... but until i tried to configure "firestarter" everything was fine... now nothing works..
is there any firewall apps which would be more similar to windows based firewalls? i have no problem using them... :)
firewall in basic package in ubuntu...
im open to suggestions for other firewalls....
tell me what you need a firewall for
what about multiport  applications like most p2p programs?
thats why i thought a firewall would be a good idea...
you're still stuck in windowisms, imho
as i said, i just switched to linux... im figuring out things as they come, but im new to linux....
it wasn't a put down, I assure you.
i didnt really take it to be, but this is pretty hard for a newbie... There ARE many ways you have to adjust your thinking too...
but nevertheless, i like what i see, eventho i dont always understand whuts wut..
just that I see so many who have just entered the Linux world from windows, looking for anti-spam, anti-virus, defragging tools, etc. :-)
u only get smarter by asking questions... so u have to appear stupid once in a while, if u want to learn :)
I'm always learning, that is why I look so stupid :-)
